entry.title: Lucky Girl
entry.summary:
Author: karmaswhiskee

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 98,736Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 100

Summary: “GIRL!” Alicia unleashes a muffled scream. “You fucking won! Oh my God, you fucking actually won!”“Dude, what? What did I win?”“The competition to become the ‘9th member’ of Stray Kids for a year! This is the letter babe! Oh my god, I need autographs, you have to promise!”I sigh. “Alicia, slow down. I know they’re having this competition, but I didn’t enter, so this literally cannot be real.”“That’s because we entered for you!”Every sound around me suddenly disappears; all I can hear is the thudding pulse in my eardrums. No way. “Wha-what? Who’s we?”“Okay. Remember how I told you this was a special birthday and that you’d never forget your twenty-first?”“Yes…”

entry.title: Behind the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: seungminnieverse

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,995Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: Seungmin is on his way home now. He needs to reach his house before midnight because he wants to lay on his bed before he gets back to work at the church tomorrow. Seungmin stretched himself and yawned a little on his way. Today is the most tiring day, and Seungmin just wanted to go home real quick because he needs his bed.But it seems like God has other plans. Seungmin stumbled upon a bleeding man two turns before his house. And as God's server, Seungmin rushed to that man to help. He can't ignore someone who needs help just because he's tired.“Sir, are you okay?” He asked, trying to gather the man's consciousness.“Oh my God, I don't think he will wake up soon,” he groaned, “okay, let me just bring you to my home and I'll try to help after. It's too dark here.”But the thing is, Seungmin doesn't know that he just helped a demon.A demon that became really possessive to him.

entry.title: Forever is Not Long Enough
entry.summary:
Author: velvetgloss

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,127Chapters: 1/15Kudos: 60

Summary: "Happy collaring day, baby." Chan murmurs into his skin."Sorry." Felix says. "I didn't mean to wake you up.""'S alright," Chan says, pulling Felix in closer. "Rather be awake with you than sleeping anyway. Been awake long?""Not really." Felix says. "I just can't sleep anymore. I'm too excited.""Yeah?"Chan's little laugh, sleep-rough and pleased, warms his skin, and Felix can't help but bite his lip. He curls his foot around Chan's ankle, shifting closer as Chan's hand skates over his skin, over his hip, his thigh, until it finds its way to wrap around his cock. His touch is light, barely there, and still Felix shudders into it."Pretty baby," Chan says approvingly. "Half-hard just from thinking about my collar, little one?"OR,When Felix and Chan venture outside of their cozy, kinky bubble for a trip home to share the news of their engagement, they reckon with their past selves and confront the effects of the very different ways they’ve loved each other. entry.title: A Prison of Red Lights
entry.summary:
Author: KiaoweLaccu

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,104Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 81

Summary: Dark, faded blue eyes flashed with moonlight.“Let me go,” whispered Hyunjin, but his plea was met with a cold and unyielding stare. In a flash of almost inhuman speed, he was on his feet and the chains pulled taut as he strained against them. “I didn’t do anything! Let me go!”Chan didn’t flinch even as Hyunjin’s face came within centimeters of his own. “You exist.”The chains stopped clanking as Hyunjin relaxed, leaning against the pull of the chains, giving his body the oddly distorted look of a marionette tangled in its strings, accentuated by the red glow overhead. He looked up at Chan again, their eyes meeting.Then he spat on his face.~~~Or my interpretation of the music video, "Red Lights" and how "Escape" is a continuation of the same story. A hunter and his captured prey grapple for control as they discover a connection deeper than their ingrained hatred for each other. Involves my own loose interpretation of wolf and moon mythology.This is part one. "Escape" will be part two.DISCLAIMER: While they share names and appearances, this is based on the characters portrayed in the videos, not the idols themselves.

entry.title: What One Would do for One Goal
entry.summary:
Author: Chocolates_Flavor_is_Macha

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,399Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 174

Summary: Kim Seungmin's shop is almost completely done, but he needs one more thing. He needs a simple acceptance from the secret governing Magical Counsel, but they won't allow the young witch a shop without protection. He either needs a coven, or he needs a familiar, and he wants neither. This is because of his own past dealing with covens and his own personal family history. But he cannot legally run his shop without the Counsel's acceptance. With no signs of an answer, one of the biggest Crime bosses, Bahng Christopher Chan, just so happened to fall right into his backyard—a hole in his chest and little to no chance of surviving this. Well, Seungmin could do a lot worse than a powerful man like Chan. And besides, the Crime Boss has his own reason for survival, a simple goal that both men can accept. But it seems there's a lot more going on underneath the surface in both their lives, and they both have to work together to achieve their goals. Or die trying.

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,857Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 189

Summary: “Hyunjin, my beautiful Hyunjin, can you look at me?” Chan asked- and this was no longer the Chan that had been teasing for hours on end. This was his Channie Hyung. Hyunjin slowly blinked his eyes open, wincing at the dull light that the lamp provided until they adjusted to it. His toes curled and his fingers buzzed with numbness as he body sank and sank and sank down to the bottom of the ocean like a rock. The flame deep within him had been distinguished, left with a deep void that couldn’t be fulfilled even when Chan gazed down at him with those loving chocolate brown eyes. “There you are, love. Are you hurting anywhere?”OrHyunjin safe words, and Chan takes care of him.

Author: SugarLeigh

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,128Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 247

Summary: May break my bones (But chains and whips excite me)  Never let it be said that Felix is not a good friend - the best of friend, really - because when Hyunjin is too nervous to go to a BDSM club on his own, Felix goes with him as moral support. Due to an unfortunate situation, Felix meets Chan, the bartender of the club. Upon realizing that Felix has no understanding of how BDSM is actually supposed to work, Chan offers to meet with him to correct some misconceptions. And Felix? He's man enough to admit that he's curious. Sure, he may just want to have an excuse to meet with Chan again, but it would also be nice to understand why Hyunjin's so enamored by the BDSM scene.  OR  Felix's slow descent into realizing he could be a sub...
